briefdescription.para: Trait for components responding to GameObject activation.

detaileddescription.para: When a type `T` satisfies `HasActivatable`, the `onActivate()` and `onDeactivate()` methods are called when the owning GameObject's active state changes via `setActive()`. Both methods must be present.
```cpp struct AIComponent { void onActivate() { startBehaviorTree(); } void onDeactivate() { pauseBehaviorTree(); } };
